plot: In this modern silent film, an unexpected meeting on a train, opens up a man's eyes to a new world of music around himself that he never saw before.
title: Civic Overture
plot_es: In this modern silent film, an unexpected meeting on a train, opens up a man's eyes to a new world of music around himself that he never saw before.
plot_en: In this modern silent film, an unexpected meeting on a train, opens up a man's eyes to a new world of music around himself that he never saw before.
